User Guide¶

Installation¶

BART_SURVIAL can be installed with:

$ pip install BART_SURVIAL

Examples¶

Examples of performing BART survival analyses. The ipynb files can be found here https://github.com/twj8CDC/BART_SURVIVAL/tree/main/examples

BART Survival with simulated data.

BART Survival with study data.
